title: FLYMEI Rechargeable Electric Foot Callus Remover Pedicure Foot File * Gently and Effectively Remove Rough / Dry / Coarse Skin in Seconds, Portable and Easy for Use* (pink)
features: Rechargeable batteries ensure you always use the device at optimal power. The buffing roller treats your feet to a massage, leaving them looking and feeling smooth and perfectly polished.
360 degree rotating roller gently and effectively buffs away toughened areas, dry and callus skin in seconds.
High speed, powerful motor with multifunctional grinding head that turns 40 times a second.
Safer and more effective than scrapers, which use blades to cut the skin.
This German designed kit is one of the highest rated electronic callus removers in the market, offering professional salon level results.
description: Do you embarrass going bare feet? Do you want to have smooth and beautiful feet? Come here!!
Our rechargeable Electric Callus Remover promises to get you far away from dry foot at anywhere!!

- Rechargeable, ensure you always use the device at optimal power. Save resource, save money of buying lithium battery.  - Detachable grinding head, easy to clean by rinsing in water and easy to renew.  - Easy to carry, painless way to enjoy smooth, soft feet.  - The mineral roller head turns a full 360 degrees at high speed, so it¡¯s effective than other ordinary foot files. Save your time.  - FREE extra replacement mineral roller head!
